thread.title: Obama Says Mass Killings Must Be Politicized
thread.title_full: Obama Says Mass Killings Must Be Politicized

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Obama Says Mass Killings Must Be Politicized
text:
Obama Says Mass Killings Must Be Politicized October 1, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
A “visibly angry” President Obama made an impassioned case that gun violence is “something we should politicize” following a mass shooting at an Oregon college, The Hill reports. 
Said Obama: “This is a political choice that we make, to allow this to happen every few months in America. We collectively are answerable to those families who lose their loved ones because of our inaction.” 
Politico : “Reiterating that “thoughts and prayers” are not enough, a visibly frustrated Obama called on state legislatures, governors and Congress to work with him to implement effective gun legislation that could prevent future shootings.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
